text: A Piece of Sky ( A Slap in the Face) (; ) is a 1980 Armenian romantic comedy movie directed by Henrik Malyan and starring Frunzik Mkrtchyan, Sofiko Chiaureli, Ashot Adamyan, Galina Belyayeva, Galya Novents, Azat Sherents. ==Other websites== * A Piece of Sky on YouTube * Category:1980 romantic comedy movies Category:Armenian movies Category:Movies directed by Henrik Malyan
title: A Piece of Sky (1980 movie)
